name: Color Planet - Paint by Number
description:
You've tried so many run-of-the-mill apps before, why not try a whole new world? Explore the exciting and immersive Color Planet, the hot new color by number app. Climb aboard for a relaxing adventure that will be sure to satisfy all your coloring needs, without wasting your time. 

Color Planet offers so much new territory to experience. With more than 3000+ coloring pages to choose from, a smooth interface and gorgeous artwork, this app delivers a truly awesome and extensive coloring experience.

Color Planet is easy to play and uses a color by numbers system. Intuitive and easy to understand, yet still mentally stimulating. With just one finger users can create their own masterpieces, anytime and anywhere. Color planet provides you a planet sized coloring catalogue, with categories including mandala, animals, natural scenery, people, constellations, and so much more. Download it now and start exploring!

Hot Features
- Easy to color.
- Various choices.
- Magical color palettes.
- New pictures everyday.
- Useful tips for coloring.
- Save and enjoy your beautiful artwork.

Color Planet makes a master artist out of anyone. Take a relaxing adventure away from everyday life and enjoy the calming coloring system, the beautiful art, and expressing yourself!
